content: That's really helpful, thank you! I'll definitely check out those brands and do my research before making any purchases. Speaking of luxury brands, I've been thinking about investing in a luxury watch. I recently bought a luxury handbag from Chanel, which cost around $2,500, and I've been really happy with the quality and craftsmanship. Now, I'm considering buying a luxury watch from Omega, which costs around $5,000. Do you think it's worth the investment?
